projects.title: RAG Chatbot
projects.description: Developed an advanced information retrieval application leveraging a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system. The core objective was to enhance search accuracy and response quality by integrating vector search embeddings, LLama2-7B, and LangChain.

projects.title: Evaluations pipeline for RAG Chatbot
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive evaluation pipeline for the RAG chatbot, enabling the assessment of various metricd . The system also includes hallucination detection to ensure the accuracy of generated responses.
keyFeatures: Various Metrices for rag chatbot evalution

projects.title: Code Assistant
projects.description: A robust Application for code generation.

projects.title: Road Scenario Detection
projects.description: This system is designed to detect vehicles, traffic signs, and pedestrians, providing a comprehensive analysis of traffic conditions. Using advanced image detection techniques, it ensures accurate and efficient identification of objects in dynamic road environments, enhancing traffic monitoring and safety
